==== How to Join ====

# Have a Launchpad account. (Sign up <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+login|here]]</nowiki>, if you don't.)
# Join the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-scientists/+join|Ubuntu Scientists team]]</nowiki> in Launchpad.
# Make sure you <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~/+editemails|subscribe to the mailing list]]</nowiki> and introduce yourself on the list (ubuntu-scientists@lists.launchpad.net).
